properties.areaDesc: Penobscot Bay; Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 10:05PM EST until January 10 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Penobscot Bay and Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth,
ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY
